attributes.action: turn the volume down on TV adds
attributes.additional_details:
Why do we all have to reach for the remote when the adds come on the TV, years ago all the volumes were the same when the TV program finished or broke for the adds  the volume was the same,  now as soon as the adds come on the volume hit the roof and everybody as to reach for the remote  !, don't the advertisement companies realise they have the adverse affect and put you off their products when their adds are so annoying .
Why are the volume not restricted so it is all the same be it  films, TV shows and advertisements ?.
